name: Physic Simulation
description:
Development Information:

The Simulation is made out of Free Assets only. It was created with Unity and written in C#. It has been created for the Diploma in Games Programming at the SAE Institute in Munich.

It was a Solo Project and should include a lot of Physical Interaction. My idea was to fire a Projectile out of a Gun and the Simulation revolves around the Physical interaction of this bullett with other objects. It is the 2nd Project that i ever worked on.

Game Information:

This is only a executable Simulation application. You are not able to play anything here. The only Input you can do in the End of the Simulation is "Space" to Restart or "Escape" to Quit the Simulation.
